techmeme.title: Disney and ITV agree a deal to stream hit shows like The Bear and Love Island on each other's platforms for the first time, starting July 16; both can sell ads (Daniel Thomas/Financial Times)
The EU publishes a voluntary code of practice to help companies follow its AI Act, including requiring developers to provide up-to-date AI feature documentation (Gian Volpicelli/Bloomberg)
Despite continued technological advances, US emergency alerts often fail to reach those in danger, as alert fatigue leads many people to disable notifications (Wall Street Journal)
Mark Zuckerberg's hiring blitz for top AI talent is spurring other leading AI scientists to join Meta in the race to build "superintelligent" AI (Parmy Olson/Bloomberg)
Trump's One Big Beautiful Bill Act mandates all new US border surveillance towers are "autonomous", effectively granting Anduril a monopoly on new contracts (Sam Biddle/The Intercept)
